column5: Not sure what I'm getting myself into, but I decided to start a blog. Click here to have a peek.  I have no idea what this thing will evolve into, or even if I will stick with it, but let's find out. It's a good way for me to scratch my writing bug, if nothing else, and that's always been fun. Hope you enjoy.
Great stuff Craig! Have it bookmarked.
Mike, the first pic on the right has a uncanny resemblance to Ferg in his younger years  Craig, got it book marked, perhaps we can add some fancy DSLR pics to it in the future!
It's very much a work in progress .... and can only improve!  Thanks for the vote of confidence.
Will bookmark it when I get home

It should turn out quite well, Craig. You KNOW fishing, you KNOW boats and who could possibly doubt your writing skills. Sounds like a winning combination for a site that I'd visit. It's a great start....let'er rip!
Can I suggest more scantily clad women in bikinis?  Just a thought

You want them scantily clad AND in bikinis?? Well Craig, if you're taking notes, I'd prefer fully dressed women with a nice smile and an appreciation for the outdoors. They get bonus points for having a beer around a campfire.
Great stuff, Craig!!  Love the title
Roy, no women have posted in the thread yet, there aren't any brownie points to gain  :)
Just bookmarked it Craig  Still needs thousands of old-school steelheading pics to really make it great though...
Great Craig !!! Love the title Now it says Buls...t in my bookmarks !!! Didnt know you wrote a book.you are my first famous friend  I will keep checkin in on the blog.  Paul
